DOC.brief_title: Intra-operative Measurements Predict Position Intraocular Lens Post-operatively
DOC.detailed_description: During last decade refractive outcome cataract surgery improve significantly . The total prediction error IOL power calculation ( therefore refractive outcome ) divide 3 main parameter : - Axial eye length ( mm ) - Corneal power ( dioptre ) - Estimation post-operative anterior chamber depth ( ACD ) ( mm ) Since introduction optical biometry ( IOLMaster , Carl Zeiss Meditec AG , Jena , Germany ) , reliable non-contact measurement axial eye length influence error axial length measurement refractive error decrease 50 % ( measure applanation ultrasound ) 36 % . The mean error corneal power measurement approximately 22 % . These result show estimation post-operative intra-ocular lens ( IOL ) position therefore estimate anterior chamber depth ( ACD ) nowadays main source error ( 35 % 42 % ) IOL power calculation therefore refractive outcome patient cataract surgery . Early IOL power calculation formula , Binkhorst I formula , use fix ACD value predict position IOL , refractive result appropriate , post-operative position IOL vary significantly patient . Later observation show correlation axial eye length post-operative ACD ( longer=more myopic eye show large ACD post-operatively ) . These correlation take account later develop formula ( Binkhorst II formula ) . Olsen et al . measure post-operative ACD substitute predict post-operative ACD true , post-operative ACD case . The result correct IOL position highly accurate IOL power calculation , fudge factor need . Nowadays pre-operatively measure ACD take account several IOL power calculation formula , Haigis formula , Holladay II formula Olsen formula . However , new generation formulas use pre-operative ACD , without consider thickness crystalline lens . The ACD measure distance anterior surface cornea ( anatomically correct would posterior surface cornea , optical context , IOL power calculation , anterior surface use ) anterior surface crystalline lens . Therefore thickness crystalline lens significant impact predict post-operative position IOL . This parameter first take account Olsen later modify Norrby . It mention IOL power calculation develop theoretical calculation base Gaussian optic regression formula , SRK formula 11 us retrospective data large number patient . Nowadays ray trace available us numerical solution calculate IOL power . All finding suggest proper measurement position size crystalline lens well lens capsule remove crystalline lens necessary improve IOL power calculation . Recently device introduce allow measurement crystalline lens well lens capsule remove crystalline lens cataract patient intra-operatively . This device use optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) technology create high resolution B-scans ( =images ) anterior segment eye . The OCT show highly reproducible ACD measurement pre-operatively small change IOL/crystalline lens detect . The intra-operative OCT may allow measurement crystalline lens , lens capsule furthermore position IOL intra-operatively . Therefore may possible first time , directly observe correlation position size crystalline lens IOL position intra-operatively . Number subject In total , 50 eye 50 subject include . - Standard eye ( IOL power 18 - 23 D ) : 30 eye - Long ( myopic ) eye ( IOL power < 18 D ) - 10 eye - Short ( hyperopic ) eye ( IOL power > 23 D ) - 10 eye Study Visits On day pre-operative examination , patient undergo full ophthalmic assessment routine biometry perform axial length measurement Keratometry ( IOLMaster , Carl Zeiss Meditec AG , Jena , Germany ) . Furthermore pre-operatively ACD lens thickness ( LT ) measure ( ACMaster , Carl Zeiss Meditec AG , Jena , Germany ) . Surgery perform topical anaesthesia . The standard preoperative therapy tropicamide 1 % gtt , phenylephrine 2.5 % gtt , cyclopentolate 1 % gtt . An on-axis self-sealing incision , injection viscoelastic substance , capsulorhexis , phacoemulsification , irrigation/aspiration cortical material perform standard procedure . After measurement , IOL implant use dedicate injector system . Intra-operative study-related measurement : OCT scan perform 4 different stage intra-operatively : 1 . At begin surgery 2 . After remove natural crystalline lens phakoemulsification irrigation/aspiration ( I/A ) . The infusion handpiece I/A set ( use routinely ) place paracentesis bottle height adjust control pressure anterior chamber . It set result estimate pressure approximately 20mmHg . Therefore hydraulic table memory function use set exactly height patient infusion bottle place height 27cm eye ( 27.2cmH2O = 20mmHg ) . Then OCT scan perform . 3 . Then ophthalmic viscosurgical device ( OVD ) insert capsular tension ring ( CTR ) implant . Therefore OVD irrigate aspirated measurement repeat . 4 . Afterwards IOL implant viscoelastic remove . Outcome variable Main outcome variable : - Intra-operative posterior capsule position CTR place Additional outcome variable - Posterior capsule position phakic eye - Posterior capsule position intra-operatively without CTR - Comparison posterior capsule position eye different axial eye length
DOC.criteria: Cataract Age 21 old write informed consent prior surgery Relevant ophthalmic disease : pseudoexfoliation , glaucoma , traumatic cataract , corneal scar , comorbidity In case pregnancy ( pregnancy test take preoperatively woman reproductive age )
